sentences.sentence: The three great essentials to achieve anything worthwhile are, first, hard work; second, stick-to-itiveness; third, common sense.
sentences.translation: 为达成任何有意义的事，需要三个关键条件，第一是努力，第二是坚持，第三是常理判断。

sentences.sentence: It took me 17 years and 114 days to become an overnight success.
sentences.translation: 我花了17年又114天的时间才在一夕之间成功。

sentences.sentence: If you can't feed a hundred people, then feed just one.
sentences.translation: 如果你还不能养活100个人，就从帮助一个人开始。

sentences.sentence: Grow your way forward, through the triumphs and the setbacks.
sentences.translation: 在胜利与挫折的交错中不断成长。

sentences.sentence: Even after all these years, I want to get better and better.
sentences.translation: 即使经过这么多年，我还是想做到精益求精。
